bioconda.name: verifybamid
bioconda.summary: verifyBamID verifies identity and purity of sequence data

biocontainers.name: verifybamid
biocontainers.summary: verifyBamID verifies identity and purity of sequence data

biotools.summary: Software that verifies whether the reads in particular file match previously known genotypes for an individual (or group of individuals), and checks whether the reads are contaminated as a mixture of two samples. It can detect sample contamination and swaps when external genotypes are available. When external genotypes are not available, it still robustly detects sample swaps.

bioschemas.name: verifyBamID
bioschemas.summary: Software that verifies whether the reads in particular file match previously known genotypes for an individual (or group of individuals), and checks whether the reads are contaminated as a mixture of two samples.
